align.description: Controls align-items CSS property, 'center' by default
align.description_zh: 控制 align-items CSS 属性，默认为 'center'

gap.description: Key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value for gap, numbers are converted to rem, 'md' by default
gap.description_zh: key） 或 gap 的任何有效 CSS 值，数字默认转换为 rem、'md'

grow.description: Determines whether each child element should have flex-grow: 1 style, false by default
grow.description_zh: 确定每个子元素是否应具有 flex-grow： 1 样式，默认为 false

justify.description: Controls justify-content CSS property, 'flex-start' by default
justify.description_zh: 控制 justify-content CSS 属性，默认为 'flex-start'

preventGrowOverflow.description: Determines whether children should take only dedicated amount of space (max-width style is set based on the number of children), true by default
preventGrowOverflow.description_zh: 确定子项是否应仅占用专用空间量（根据子项的数量设置 max-width 样式），默认情况下为 true

wrap.description: Controls flex-wrap CSS property, 'wrap' by default
wrap.description_zh: 控制 flex-wrap CSS 属性，默认为 'wrap'
